original_text:
I write to you, dear children,
    because you know the Father.
I write to you, fathers,
    because you know him who is from the beginning.
I write to you, young men,
    because you are strong,
    and the word of God lives in you,
    and you have overcome the evil one.
korean_text: 아이들아 내가 너희에게 쓴 것은 너희가 아버지를 알았음이요 아비들아 내가 너희에게 쓴 것은 너희가 태초부터 계신 이를 알았음이요 청년들아 내가 너희에게 쓴 것은 너희가 강하고 하나님의 말씀이 너희 안에 거하시며 너희가 흉악한 자를 이기었음이라

sentences.original_text: I write to you, dear children
because you know him who is from the beginning
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 처음부터 계신 분을 알기 때문이다

sentences.original_text: I write to you, young men
and the word of God lives in you
and you have overcome the evil one
